name: Adrián Ripoll Casas
body:
### Welcome to all.
I'm a Telecommunications Technologies Engineering Degree student at [Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingenierías Informática y de Telecomunicación](http://etsiit.ugr.es/) in Granada and this is my personal page for github.


### Social Profiles

```
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/adrian.ripollcasas)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Adrirc8)
[Linkedin](https://es.linkedin.com/in/adrirc8)
```

### GitHub Main Projects
```
[Virtual WLAN Lab](https://github.com/Adrirc8/Virtual-WLAN-Lab)
```
### Contact me

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
